ygData.subject: Re: I cant stand it any longer!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Well you could have at least let us have our little fantasy of self-importance. After all, the casters get not one, but two (GZ *AND* the Verant Sysop)
ygData.messageBody:
At 01:49 PM 8/27/99 -0500, you wrote:
>From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
>
>JM Cappozi (sp?) is/was a beta tester who got to be close friends with the
>dev team. Go back and re-read his posts - NEVER does he claim to be a
>programmer (that I saw) but the detail and quality of his information made
>it sure seem like he - himself had to be a Verant employee. But really --
>that's something that _we_ super-imposed on him.

Well you could have at least let us have our little fantasy of self-importance.
After all, the casters get not one, but two (GZ *AND* the Verant Sysop)
posting regularly there....

Guess we have no one listening here. Oh well. It's not important anyway.

Talies the Wanderer
